r.d: MDB is a merge of PEAR DB's and Metabases that provides a unified DB API. It also provides methods for DB portability and DB feature emulation. Most notably it features a DB independent XML-Schema manager.
r.n: PHPDoc have now been added to all methods in common.php; some API changes, mostly to the transaction methods; introduced a simple subselect emulation; added postgresql driver; fix fetchInto in the pear db wrapper
